idea_text: "an explainer video about what happens if you forget to file your tax return"

assets.artwork_prompt: Create an animated scene featuring the reference character standing in a modern, bright home office. The character looks worried, with wide eyes and a slightly open mouth, glancing at a stack of unopened mail labeled "Tax Documents" on a cluttered desk. The desk features a laptop displaying a calendar highlighting the overdue date in red. Sunlight filters through a window, casting soft shadows, while a wall clock shows the time as 11:59. Scattered papers and a coffee mug add to the sense of urgency. The mood is tense yet informative, emphasizing the importance of filing tax returns on time.
assets.script: Oh no, I forgot to file my tax return! If this happens, you could face penalties and interest on any taxes owed. It's crucial to file as soon as possible to minimize these fees and get back on track.
